name: Tutankham Returns
overview: This game for Commodore 64 is a tribute to Tutankham, an arcade game developed by Konami in 1982. This version is made up of 7 completely new stages. In this game, the player controls an explorer who is robbing Tutankhamun's tomb. The player will search for precious treasures (maps, lamps, chests of gold & jewels, and, above all, the golden mask of King Tut) and fight off the various creatures that guard the tomb to ultimately find the way through the catacombs.
